body_html:
Digging this up :).

Tried sandboxed build and I'm still seeing both issues:
(1) Build failure with execvp("external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc", ...): No such file or directory.
@philwo do you mind clarify "add that file to the Skylark repository you're building in that script"? This file has already been added to

tensorflow/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL.tpl

Line 171 in 48fb73a

tool_path { name: "gcc" path: "clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc" }
. @davidzchen helped taking a look and we are not sure where else we can add it to make it available since it is part of the toolchain.

(2) Sandboxed build is still slow on mac. It took about twice as long as our normal mac build, and we are using bazel 0.4.4. https://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-cl-mac/16842/. @philwo is the fix you mentioned available and how do we use it?

Appreciate the help!
body_text:
Digging this up :).
Tried sandboxed build and I'm still seeing both issues:
(1) Build failure with execvp("external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc", ...): No such file or directory.
@philwo do you mind clarify "add that file to the Skylark repository you're building in that script"? This file has already been added to 
  
    
      tensorflow/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL.tpl
    
    
         Line 171
      in
      48fb73a
    
    
    
    

        
          
             tool_path { name: "gcc" path: "clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc" } 
        
    
  

. @davidzchen helped taking a look and we are not sure where else we can add it to make it available since it is part of the toolchain.
(2) Sandboxed build is still slow on mac. It took about twice as long as our normal mac build, and we are using bazel 0.4.4. https://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-cl-mac/16842/. @philwo is the fix you mentioned available and how do we use it?
Appreciate the help!
body:
Digging this up :).

Tried sandboxed build and I'm still seeing both issues:
(1) Build failure with execvp("external/local_config_cuda/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc", ...): No such file or directory. 
@philwo do you mind clarify "add that file to the Skylark repository you're building in that script"? This file has already been added to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/48fb73a1c94ee2409382225428063d3496dc651e/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL.tpl#L171. @davidzchen helped taking a look and we are not sure where else we can add it to make it available since it is part of the toolchain.

(2) Sandboxed build is still slow on mac. It took about twice as long as our normal mac build, and we are using bazel 0.4.4. https://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-cl-mac/16842/. @philwo is the fix you mentioned available and how do we use it? 

Appreciate the help!
